reviewText: oh by the way viewers my one review by Erin Kearney is actually a girl I went to college with... one good thing about today's technology Erin is that you can pretty much find out anything about anybody and it took me a matter of about oh I don't know, 2 minutes to find out who the real review was from.  One of my biggest pet peeves has always been jealous, vindictive people so even though I am a professional in every sense of the word, I do feel the need to call out people who are jealous and vindictive!
This is the worst pilates DVD I have ever done.  The instructor is terrible. Do not waste your money. It is obvious that there was no thought put in to this DVD.
